glsa.title: Dovecot: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Dovecot could allow a remote attacker to create a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Dovecot is an open source IMAP and POP3 email server.

description.p: Dovecot does not properly close connections, allowing a resource exhaustion for incomplete SSL/TLS handshakes.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Dovecot users should upgrade to the latest version:
